title: Live Transcribe doesn't work on my Pixel 5
content:
Live Transcribe doesn't operate on my Pixel 5. The Recorder app works fine, and recording audio with the Camera app works fine. The Microsoft Translator app, which has a similar function but can't run continuously, also works fine. Live Caption works fine for media and calls.

I have ensured I have the appropriate Microphone permission enabled. I have also enabled the Storage permission since it's there, but not specifically requested. I have disabled and reenabled the noted permissions repeatedly. I have updated to the newest version of Live Transcribe in the play store, and both the original shipped version on the phone and the update do not function. I have force stopped the app, cleared cache and storage, rebooted. Nothing - the sound presence bubble at the top right indicates no sound heard. Desperate to get this working. If I can't, the phone will have to be returned.
